review.title: “Policed and monitored, Fair design knowledge learning.”
review.pros: Pros – -Good knowledge learning curve in certain teams-Onsite work opportunity to understand processes and training-Good opportunities for growth for loyal employees-Located in the heart of the city
review.cons: Cons – -Some teams do very menial jobs and ends up messing up with your head leading to higher attrition rates-hidden office politics, nepotism by higher management-Low balling and unfair pay packages-Software issues, specifically slower speeds which cause you to lose focus and damage productivity and efficiency-unnecessary restrictions and heavy policing by company with respect to personal hygiene including clean shaven face everyday! which is not practical for everyone, haircuts, nails, attire, restricted access to internet.. all which may be a bit over the top and not required in a corporate company.-very long work hours but no compensation for the same - work 40hrs or 80 hrs, you get the same pay-Compensation for weekend work (which happens quite frequently) is given as a day off and not financially compensated
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – - Your employees are the reason your company is prospering. Take care of your employees. Your bad attitude will only increase attrition rates. Learn from the cons above and give the respect your employees deserve.
